channel.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
channel.description:
So I had a grand idea, I should make a huge release to thank all the model section people for how theyve helped me...so i then decided, Why not remake the classic RS armour? I will be remaking the level 1-40 armour, adding my own 'Tribbinator' flair to the armor, to make it more appealing to private servers...in theory. Hah.
[size=18pt]---------Completion List--------[/size] --Longswords --Two-handers
[size=18pt]---------Renders-----------[/size] ~~~~~~LONGSWORDS 700 Poly~~~~~~~~~~ [URL=http://img263.imageshack.us/i/longswords.png/][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/2766/longswords.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img132.imageshack.us/i/longswordwf.png/][IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/3646/longswordwf.png[/img][/URL]
~~~~~~TWO-HANDERS 660 Poly~~~~~~~~~~ [URL=http://img340.imageshack.us/i/52432209.png/][IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/1779/52432209.png[/img][/URL] See the size difference in the longsword and the 2h'ers?
[URL=http://img146.imageshack.us/i/2hwf.png/][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/622/2hwf.png[/img][/URL]
So leave comments...and i will also need someone willing to make correct ints (with quality rotation ints)...when I am finished. I mean, i could do the ints, but Im pretty sure that after I finish this, i wont want to make ints :P Enjoy!

@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:339308”]I normally love your work, not so keen on these though sorry.
Mainly to do with the colour of the hilt and the general design of it.[/quote]

Couldn’t agree more.

The hilt/handle needs more design.

And make sure your using EXACT runescape weapon colors.

item.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Look, the hilt extends half way down the grip area. There is a small area where you can actually grip the blade. Based on the tiny area, that would be very heavy on the rest of your arm. The blade is 3 times the hit+grip. It should be about 2.1, 2.2.

Edit:You still need to shink the longsword.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I looked over the sword and it looks like if he makes the grip where you hold the sword about 1 block longer then it would look fine. Maybe not as much as a full block, I’m just using that as an estimation.

item.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Not too much though. As the name suggests, its a longsword. As long as it seems it can be handled with one hand it should classify as one. These swords are long enough to possibly be considered as a two-hander, so yes, they should be shortened, but if they are shortened too much, they’ll appear as just simply a sword or even a short sword.

Read full topic
item.source: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]

item.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

the wanderer:

I don’t really believe that the blade on those are too long for a longsword. It looks like it is a good length for a longsword. A 2h is typically 4/5 someones height or about 55 inches.

2h Longsword

I’d still shorten the blade

Read full topic

@reyx7 wrote:

Tribbinator:

These are just longswords…Working on the 2h’er now,

If those are longswords, the 2h will be huge.
You should make that the 2h, not only because of the size, but because you need a bigger hilt for 2h’s

item.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Haha… Thanks for the comments Charlie, its totally understandable. I made them for RS, therefore they will look good ingame…These are just longswords…Working on the 2h’er now, should be better…The armour I will work hard on too

@ Demonlover…I didnt use any ref pics, used my own imagination and C4D, sheer coincidence if they look alike

Thanks for all the comments guys!

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Remake of the Classic Level 1-40 Armor [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:8, topic:339308”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=435692.msg3199984#msg3199984 date=1273246819]
Very nice, but try to be more creative instead of recoloring/sizing the same sword over again. I still love em’ tho 9/10.
[/quote][/quote]
I would just like to say when you look at the original runescape weapons the only weapons that change are the dragon weapons. All the rest stay the same size and shape, just the color of the blade changes. And I love the idea Tribb. I will do the ints if you would like me to. I have Frell’s int maker, so I’m pretty sure they will be of good quality.

Read full topic
